Name: POTION
Explain: A spray-type wound medicine. It restores the HP of one POK*MON by 20 points.

Name: SUPER POTION
Explain: A spray-type wound medicine. It restores the HP of one POK*MON by 50 points.

Name: HYPER POTION
Explain: A spray-type wound medicine. It restores the HP of one POK*MON by 200 points.

Name: ANTIDOTE
Explain: A spray-type medicine. It heals one Pok*mon from a poisoning.

Name: BURN HEAL
Explain: A spray-type medicine. It heals one POK*MON of a burn.

Name: FULL HEAL
Explain: A spray-type medicine. It heals all the status problems of one POK*MON.

Name: POK* BALL
Explain: A BALL thrown to catch a wild POK*MON. It is designed in a capsule style.
